data.title: Le Prevost
data.text:
Descendants of Job LE PREVOST

This information comes from the research of Alex Glendinning, Elizabeth Greef, Victoria Le Prevost, Barbara Gibb, Violet Wakeford and Tony Bellows

PARISH CODES: (C) Castel (St S) St Saviours (St A) St Andrews (St PDB) St Pierre du Bois (T) Torteval (F) Forest, (St MdC) St Mary de Castro (St M) St Martins, (St PP) St Peter Port, all in Guernsey; (St H) St Helier, Jersey

It includes the following surnames:

Alexandre, Allaire, Allez, Anquetil,

Battam, Bougourd, Brehaut, Breton, Brouard, Buskermolen,

Collenette, Coutanche, Davies, De Castro, De Garis, De La Mare, De La Rue, Duffy,

Falla, Ferbrache, Flochmoine, Gallienne, Godfray, Hocquet, Jehan,

Lajoie, Langlois, Le Mesurier, Le Moigne, Le Page, Le Sauvage, Lenfestey,

Martin, Mauger, McNeill, Nentwich, Noel, Rougier,

Savident, Stephens, Thebaut, Tostevin

Generation 1

Jean LE PREVOST

Generation 4

Child of Jean LE PREVOST & Marie ROUGIER:

Job LE PREVOST, b. 27 October 1665 (St S), + 30 August 1690 (St S) Marguerite BROUARD, b. 1660, d/o Phillipin BROUARD & Perotine LENFESTEY

Generation 6

Children of Job LE PREVOST and Marie ALLAIRE:

Jean LE PREVOST, bap. 20 November 1715 (St S)

Collas LE PREVOST, bap. 10 October 1717 (St S)

Marie LE PREVOST, bap. 11 February 1721 (St S)

Susanne LE PREVOST, bap. 9 December 1725 (St S)

Nicolas LE PREVOST, bap. 23 March 1728 (St S)

Jean LE PREVOST, bap. February 1731 (St S) + Marthe JEHAN, bap. 15 February 1729 (Torteval), + 13 January 1754 (St A), d/o Daniel JEHAN and Marthe BREHAUT

Job LE PREVOST, bap. 24 November 1734 (St S)

Nicolas LE PREVOST, bap. 20 August 1738 (St S)

Generation 7

Children of Jean LE PREVOST and Marthe JEHAN:

Nicolas LE PREVOST , b. 3 February 1754 (Castel), bap. 17 February 1754 (C), + Marie NOEL, b. 19 September 1760 (Forest), bap. 21 September 1760 (F), + 2 April 1781 (Castel), d/o Jean NOEL Jnr and Judith LE SAUVAGE

Marie LE PREVOST, b. 11 February 1756 (C), bap. 25 February 1756 (C)

Jean LE PREVOST, b. & bap. 26 January 1759 (C)

Elizabeth LE PREVOST, bap. 12 November 1761 (C), d. 7 June 1841 (C).

Susanne LE PREVOST, b. 24 March 1764 (C), bap. 1 April 1764 (C)

Job LE PREVOST, b. 27 October 1766 (C), bap. 9 November 1766 (C)

Daniel LE PREVOST, bap. 11 June 1769 (C)

Rachel LE PREVOST, bap. 15 November 1772 (C)

Marthe LE PREVOST, bap. 3 November 1776 (C)

Generation 8

Children of Nicolas LE PREVOST and Marie NOEL:

Nicolas LE PREVOST, b. 31 July 1781 (C), bap. 6 August 1781 (C)

Jean LE PREVOST, b. 1 August 1783 (C), bap. 3 August 1783 (C)

Thomas LE PREVOST, b. 1 February 1785 (C), bap. 6 February 1785 (C), d. 15 February 1864 Mont Durand (St PP), + Elizabeth DE LA RUE, b. c1782, d. 17 September 1863 (St PP), d/o Massy DE LA RUE and Judith GALLIENNE (David Le Prevost's line)

Richard LE PREVOST, b. 19 July 1788 (C), bap. 20 July 1788 (C)

Charles LE PREVOST, b. 13 December 1790, bap. 19 December 1790 (C), d. bef. 1864, + 11 September 1819 (C) Marie DE LA MARE, b. 22 June 1798 (St PDB), bap. 24 June 1798 (St PDB), d. 26 December 1864 L'Eree (St PDB), d/o Nicolas DE LA MARE and Marie BREHAUT

William LE PREVOST, bap. 15 September 1793 (C)

Marie LE PREVOST, b. 17 August 1799 (C), bap. 18 August 1799 (C)

Generation 9

Children of Charles LE PREVOST and Marie DE LA MARE:

Daniel LE PREVOST, b. 8 August 1820 (C), bap. 20 August 1820 (C), + Elizabeth (Betsey) MAUGER, d/o Jean MAUGER (C) and Caroline CHIVRET (C)

Charles LE PREVOST, b. 7 March 1822 (C), bap. 17 March 1822 (C), + 1846 (St PDB) Caroline LE SAUVAGE, b. 10 August 1828 (T), d/o Jean LE SAUVAGE & Elizabeth GALLIENNE (GP  James LE MOIGNE, Marie BREHAUT, & Marguerite GALLIENNE)

Marie LE PREVOST, b. 23 June 1825 (C), bap. 10 July 1825 (C)

Thomas LE PREVOST, b. 20 February 1828 (C), bap. 16 March 1828 (C), + 11 March 1851 (St H) Marie BATTAM, bap. 19 November 1829 (St H), d/o Jean BATTAM and Susanne MARETT

Nicolas LE PREVOST, b. 12 February 1831 (C), bap. 6 March 1831 (C)

Jean Bonamy LE PREVOST, b. 12 April 1835 (C), bap. 10 May 1835 (C), d. 4 September 1921, Bailiff Cross (St A), + Lydie Maria BREHAUT

Children of Thomas LE PREVOST and Elizabeth DE LA RUE:

Nicolas Guillaume (William) LE PREVOST, b. 15 September 1814 (C), d. 30. August 1905, Pre du Pont Allavie, Vale, + (1) Susanne TOSTEVIN, d/o Jacques TOSTEVIN and Marie SARRE, b. 10 March 1807 (St PdB), d. 10 December 1847 (C), + (2) Mary Elizabeth BOUCHER, b. Jersey

Anne Noel LE PREVOST, b. c1819 (C), d. 28 June 1893 Sous L'Eglise (St S), + Jean FALLA s/o Jean FALLA & Marie LE POIDEVIN, b. c1819 Vale, d. 25 December 1880 Vale

Marie Marthe LE PREVOST, b. c1820 (C), d. 14 July 1891, + Daniel TOSTEVIN

Betsey LE PREVOST, b. c1828

Generation 10 - JERSEY & GUERNSEY

Children of Thomas LE PREVOST and Marie BATTAM (Elizabeth Greef's line):

Mary Jane LE PREVOST , b. c 1852

Henriette Louise LE PREVOST b. c 1854, + _____ THEBAUT

Julia Agnes LE PREVOST, b. c 1855

Thomas Edward LE PREVOST, b. c 1857, + Elizabeth GREY?

Ophelia Mary Ann LE PREVOST, b. c 1861

Charles John LE PREVOST, b. c 1862

Jane Victoria LE PREVOST, b. c 1864, d. 15 October 1949 in Liverpool, + 18.4.1885 (St H) Sgt. Robert MCNEILL (29th Worcestershire Regiment), b. c1860, Liverpool, England, d. 26 April 1904, West Derby

Alice Maud Mary LE PREVOST, b. 18 August 1866 (St H), d. 1941, + 19 September 1885 (St H) John DAVIES, b. 1861 (Scotland), d. 1916

Priscilla Angelina LE PREVOST, b. c 1869, d. 2 July 1943, + William George GODFRAY - no issue

Laura Adeline LE PREVOST, b. 27 November 1871 (St H), d. 5 October 1936, + 5 November 1892 Edwin Walter GODFRAY, s/o Durell GODFRAY & Harriet JOYCE?, b. 1 September 1872 (St H) , d. 24 April 1906

Children of Charles LE PREVOST & Caroline LE SAUVAGE (Victoria Le Prevost's line):

Charles LE PREVOST, b. 25 February 1847 (St PDB) + Mary Anne DE GARIS, daughter of Charles DE GARIS & Sophie ALLEZ

Caroline LE PREVOST, b. 1850 (St PDB) + James COLLENETTE

Pierre LE PREVOST, b. 4 February 1849 (St PDB)

Jean Alfred LE PREVOST, b. 15 November 1852 (St PDB)

Nicolas LE PREVOST, b. 29 November 1856

Rachel LE PREVOST, b. 1 October 1858

Lydie Marie LE PREVOST, b. 8 December 1859 (St S)

William LE PREVOST, b. 9 July 1861 (St S)

All living at Les Rouvets, St Saviour  1851 census

Children of Daniel LE PREVOST and Elizabeth (Betsy) MAUGER:

Mary Ann LE PREVOST, b. 7 February 1845 (St MdC)

Daniel LE PREVOST, b. 20 June 1846 (St MdC), + Louisa BRETON

Nicolas LE PREVOST, b. 21 July 1847 (St MdC)

Thomas LE PREVOST, b. 18 February 1852 (St MdC)

Betsy LE PREVOST, b. 31 December 1853 (St MdC)

Eve LE PREVOST, b. 28 September 1855 (St MdC)

Frederick LE PREVOST, b. c1859, Les Dunes (C), d. 10 November 1944, Grand Rocques, Guernsey, + 30 June 1881 Mary FERBRACHE, b. 15 February 1856 Vazon, Guernsey, d. 17 April 1949, Port Gras, Guernsey (Jacki Renouf's line)

Eliza LE PREVOST, b. 15 December 1861 (St MdC)

Children of Nicolas William LE PREVOST and Mary Elizabeth BOUCHER:

Thomas Dickson LE PREVOST, b. 4 December 1860 (C), d. 1 February 1939, + Mary Judith BISSON, b. 3 July 1863 Vale, d. 13 November 1927

Philippe Bidaux LE PREVOST, b. 18 February 1862, d. 26 December 1935

John Frederick LE PREVOST, b. c1863, d. 17 October 1926, Grande Vale

Children of Jean Bonamy LE PREVOST and Lydie Maria BREHAUT:

John Alfred LE PREVOST, b. 12 December 1859, d. 1859

John Alfred LE PREVOST, b. 8 July 1860, d. 20 February 1862

Lydie LE PREVOST, b. 1863, d. 1867

Jean LE PREVOST, b. 23 January 1865, d. 11 April 1946

Pierre Bonamy LE PREVOST, b. 6 May 1866, d. 29 October 1866

Lydie LE PREVOST, b. 11 May 1867, d. 20 April 1961, + 21 August 1897 William SAVIDENT, b. 27 November 1854

Mary LE PREVOST, b. 13 December 1869, d. 12 May 1961, + 1891 William QUERIPEL

Ellen Florence LE PREVOST, b. 25 January 1871, d. 1 January 1948, + 1892 George DE LA MARE

Aimee LE PREVOST, b. 17 May 1874, d. 7 June 1874

Archibald Edward LE PREVOST, b. 4 April 1881, d. 31 October 1940, + 1900 Elise BREHAUT (St PDB)

Generation 12 - GUERNSEY

Children of Charles LE PREVOST, s/o Charles LE PREVOST, b. 25 February 1847 (St PDB), Head farm labourer at Les Rouvets, St Saviour, + Mary Anne DE GARIS, daughter of Charles DE GARIS & Sophie ALLEZ:

Edgar LE PREVOST, b. 12 August 1871, d. 1 August 1943 at Frie Baton (St S), + Rachel BOUGOURD, b. 18 August 1873 (T), d. 27 July 1935, daughter of Peter BOUGOURD & Rachel BREHAUT of Le Rocher, Torteval

Edwy LE PREVOST, b. 26 March 1874 (St S), + Mary DE JERSEY

Edmund LE PREVOST, b. c1875 (St S)

Edna LE PREVOST, b. c1878 (St S)

Eugene LE PREVOST, b. c1879 (St S)

Emile LE PREVOST, b. c1881 (St S)

Edwin LE PREVOST, b. 22 August 1882, d. 27 April 1883

Eugenie LE PREVOST, b. c1882 (St S), + Nicolas LE PREVOST,, emigrated to Canada, 1929

Ernest LE PREVOST, b. c1884 (St S), + Elsie LE MESURIER

Elton LE PREVOST, b. 2 January 1886

Elvie LE PREVOST, b. 2 January 1886

Edward LE PREVOST, b. c1887, + Alice FERBRACHE

Ella LE PREVOST, b. c1888 (St S)

Eveline LE PREVOST, b. c1891 (St S)

Albert LE PREVOST, b. 6 July 1893

Arthur LE PREVOST, b. 6 July 1893, 1 August 1893

Children of Daniel LE PREVOST and Louisa BRETON:

Alice Rachel LE PREVOST, b. 1870

Jean LE PREVOST, b. c1872

Alfred LE PREVOST, b. c1879, + (1) ____ CAVANAUGH, + (2) Albertine HOCQUET

Nicolas LE PREVOST, b. after 1881

Children of Frederick LE PREVOST & Mary FERBRACHE:

Mary FERBRACHE, b. 15 February 1877 (C), d. 12 February 1964 Rangiora, New Zealand, + (1) 16 October 1898 Walter John James KEAYS, b. 9 March 1872 (St M), d. 22 March 1900, Gsy, + (2) 15 September 1915 William Henry RENOUF, b. 9 May 1882, d. 9 July 1945 Reading, England

Nicolas Daniel FERBRACHE, b. 21 January 1874 (C), d. 23 November 1948

Frederick LE PREVOST, b. c1879 (C), + Priscilla GUALLIANNE

Elizabeth LE PREVOST, b. c1883, The Dunes (C), d. c1960 Guernsey, + William WILLIAMS - one child George WILLIAMS, d. 1940s

Lydia LE PREVOST, b. c1884 The Dunes (C)

Thomas LE PREVOST, b. c1889 The Dunes (C)

Annie LE PREVOST, b. c1891 The Dunes (C)

Susan LE PREVOST

Archibald LE PREVOST

Charles LE PREVOST, + Lydie Elsie SAVIDENT

Child of Thomas Dickson LE PREVOST (s/o Nicolas William LE PREVOST & Mary Elizabeth BOUCHER) and Mary Judith BISSON:

Thomas Bisson LE PREVOST, b. 28 March 1883, d. 9 May 1944, + Edith Mary Ann BOUGOURD, b. 23 January 1883, d. 8 August 1959

Children of William SAVIDENT and Lydie LE PREVOST:

William John SAVIDENT, b. 27 November 1894

Lydie SAVIDENT, b. 6 January 1899, d. 8 October 1899

Lydia Elsie Sophie SAVIDENT, b. 16 March 1900, d. 30 June 1960, + Charles LE PREVOST (grandson of Daniel LE PREVOST)

Archibald Edward SAVIDENT, b. 3 February 1902, + Lilian Maud LE PREVOST

Child of Archibald Edward LE PREVOST (s/o Jean Bonamy LE PREVOST & Lydie Maria BREHAUT) and Elise BREHAUT:

Emmeline Mildred LE PREVOST, b. 1914, d. 1970, + Albert LE CRAS

Generation 13 - GUERNSEY, AUSTRALIA & NEW ZEALAND, UK & USA

Children of Edgar LE PREVOST & Rachel BOUGOURD:

Rachel LE PREVOST, b. 5 October 1906 (St S), d. 12 May 1971 (Manchester), + Archie LANGLOIS

Ena LE PREVOST, b. 30 May 1908 (St S), d. 12 December 1971, + George LE MOIGNE

Reta LE PREVOST, b. 8 January 1911 (St S), d. 4 August 1972, + Desiree LAJOIE

Edgar LE PREVOST, b. 1913 (St S), d. 21 December 1993 at Frie Baton (St S), + Wilma SAVIDENT

Percy LE PREVOST, b. 12 May 1915 (St S), d. 4 May 1973, + 1938 Aimee Jeanne LAJOIE, b. 20 April 1914 (F), d. 15 September 1996, (d/o Auguste Alexandre LAJOIE, b. Sortosville en Beaumont, Normandy, & Louise Marie LE FLOCHMOINE, b. Chatelaudren, Brittany) - Aimees godmother  Jeanne RISBECQ

Child of Alfred LE PREVOST & (1) __________ CAVANAUGH:

Winifred LE PREVOST

Children of Alfred LE PREVOST & (2) Albertine HOCQUET (2nd wife):

Lloyd LE PREVOST, living, + Vera Jane FALLA (See Tony Bellows Family Tree)

Donald Arthur LE PREVOST, living, + Leona Beryl BISSON (moved to Australia) living

Pearl LE PREVOST, living, + Arthur HOLLINGSWORTH

Child of Thomas Bisson LE PREVOST and Edith Mary Ann BOUGOURD:

Lilian Edith LE PREVOST, b. 1 January 1903, d. 16 June 1974

Edward Thomas LE PREVOST, b. 18 April 1905, d. 25 September 1917

Harold Wilson LE PREVOST, b.18 November 1909, d. 27 May 1910

John Henry LE PREVOST, b. 4 February 1912 (Guernsey), d. 10 June 1966 (Auckland), + Gladys Esther Frances BAUDAINS, b. 15 October 1913 (Guernsey), d. 29 October 2001 (in Auckland, New Zealand), d/o Charles Francis BAUDAINS & Esther Jane RICHARDS

Olive Mary LE PREVOST, b. 19 April 1921, d. 20 September 1992

Dora LE PREVOST, 8 February 1923

Thomas William LE PREVOST, b. 5 April 1925

Mary LE PREVOST, 20 October 1927, d. 19 May 1928

Children of Frederick LE PREVOST & Priscilla GUALLIANNE (Guernsey):

Frederick LE PREVOST

Mary Louise LE PREVOST

Linda LE PREVOST

Sylvia LE PREVOST, b. c1915 The Dunes (C)

Lydia LE PREVOST, b. c1917 The Dunes (C), + ______ SAUVAGE

Grace LE PREVOST

Frank LE PREVOST

Clarice LE PREVOST

Beatrice LE PREVOST

Children of Mary FERBRACHE & William Henry RENOUF:

Roy William Mansell RENOUF, b. 10 November 1917 (St PP), + 27 September 1941 Joan Winsor NILES, b. 15 February 1921, Vale, Guernsey

Child of James GIBB & Jane Victoria MCNEILL (d/o Jane LE PREVOST & Robert MCNEILL):

Robert GIBB, + Annie JONES

Generation 14 - GUERNSEY, AUSTRALIA, N.Z.

Children of Percy LE PREVOST & Aimee LAJOIE:

Brian Percy LE PREVOST, living (C)

Alan John LE PREVOST, living (C)

Royal Victoria LE PREVOST, living (C), + 1965, Guernsey, Franciscus Andreas BUSKERMOLEN, living (Aalsmeer, Holland), s/o Gerardus Bernardus BUSKERMOLEN & Maria Petronella VAN EIJG. Emigrated to Australia Feb. 1966. (Victoria's GP: Dora and George LANOE & Ena LE MOIGNE)

Child of John Henry LE PREVOST and Gladys Esther Frances BAUDAINS:

David John Baudains LE PREVOST, living, St Peter Port

Children of Donald LE PREVOST & Leona BISSON:

Stephen LE PREVOST, living

Michael LE PREVOST, living

Child of Roy William Mansell RENOUF & Joan Winsor NILES:

Jacqueline Mary RENOUF, living, Chelmsford, Essex

Child of Robert GIBB & Annie JONES:

___________ GIBB, + Barbara _______

Generation 15 - AUSTRALIA

Children of (Royal) Victoria LE PREVOST & Franciscus BUSKERMOLEN:

Danick Aimee BUSKERMOLEN, living (GP: Mr & Mrs Jan Schreuders )

Pierre Gerard BUSKERMOLEN, living (GP: Elizabeth & Piet ALDERDEN & Bruna WICHKOWSKA), + 1999 Renee NENTWICH, d/o Peter NENTWICH & Helen HERBERT)
